You must be at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into contracts in order to use our website and services. By using our website or services, you represent and warrant that you meet these eligibility requirements.

In order to access certain features of our website and services, you may need to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information when registering for an account, and to update your account information promptly if it changes. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account login credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

We strive to ensure that the information on our website and in our product descriptions is accurate, complete, and up-to-date. However, we cannot guarantee that all information is error-free or current.

We reserve the right to modify the contents of our website and product descriptions at any time, but we have no obligation to update any information. You agree that it is your responsibility to monitor changes to our website and product descriptions.


We make every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images of our products, but we cannot guarantee that your computer or device will accurately display such colors and images.

We are not liable for any loss or damage arising from your reliance on information on our website or in our product descriptions. It is your responsibility to verify the accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of any information before relying on it.

We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our service, including the availability of any product or service, at any time without notice.

We may change the prices for our products or services at any time, without notice. We also reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for a product or service at any time, for any reason.

We shall not be liable to you or any third-party for any modification, price change, suspension, or discontinuance of our service.We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our service, including the availability of any product or service, at any time without notice.

If we make any material changes to our service, we will notify you by email or by posting a notice on our website. Your continued use of our service after such changes shall constitute your agreement to the modified terms.Â

Products or services may only be available online and are subject to availability. We reserve the right to limit sales to any person, geographic region, or jurisdiction. We may place restrictions on the total number of a given product or service that can be purchased. Descriptions of products or pricing are subject to change at any time without notice. We do not warrant that products or services will meet your expectations or that any errors will be corrected.

We reserve the right to refuse any order and limit or cancel quantities purchased. You agree to provide accurate and complete information for all purchases and promptly update your account information. We may correct errors or inaccuracies and cancel orders if information is inaccurate. We may suspend or terminate your account if we suspect any fraudulent or unauthorised activity.

We may provide access to third-party tools, which are offered "as is" and without any warranties or endorsements. Your use of optional tools is at your own risk and discretion. We may also offer new services and features in the future, subject to these Terms of Service.

Our website and services may include content provided by third parties, as well as links to third-party websites. We do not endorse, control, or guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any third-party content or website, and we are not responsible for any harm or damages that may result from your use of such content or websites.

You agree not to use our website or services for any unlawful or unauthorized purpose. You also agree not to:
- Use our website or services in a manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our servers or networks, or interfere with any other user's use of our website or services.
- Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our website or services, or to any accounts, computer systems, or networks connected to our website or services.
- Use any automated means to access our website or services or to collect information from our website or services, such as by using robots, spiders, or scrapers.
- Impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity.
- Use our website or services to transmit any viruses, worms, or other malware.
- Engage in any conduct that we deem to be inappropriate, such as harassment, bullying, hate speech, or discrimination.

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Custom Chic, its affiliates, and their respective directors, officers, employees, and agents from and against any claims, actions, demands, liabilities, and settlements, including without limitation reasonable legal and accounting fees, arising out of or in connection with your use of our website or services, your breach of these Terms, or your violation of any applicable laws or regulations.

We may terminate your access to our website or services at any time, for any reason or no reason, without notice to you. Upon termination, you must immediately cease all use of our website and services.

These Terms and your purchase of our products shall be managed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these Terms or your purchase shall be resolved exclusively by the courts of England.
